FontFace.summary: The FontFace interface of the CSS Font Loading API represents a single usable font face.

remarks.para:
This interface defines the source of a font face, either a URL to an external resource or a buffer, and font properties such as style, weight, and so on.
For URL font sources it allows authors to trigger when the remote font is fetched and loaded, and to track loading status.

FontFaceAscentOverride.summary: The ascentOverride property of the interface returns and sets the ascent metric for the font, the height above the baseline that CSS uses to lay out line boxes in an inline formatting context.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the @font-face/ascent-override descriptor of @font-face.

FontFaceAscentOverride.value: A string. The possible values are normal, indicating that the metric used should be obtained from the font file, or a percentage.This property accepts the same values as the @font-face/ascent-override descriptor.

FontFaceDescentOverride.summary:
The descentOverride property of the interface returns and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@font-face/descent-override")}} descriptor.
The possible values are normal, indicating that the metric used should be obtained from the font file, or a percentage.

FontFaceDisplay.summary:
The display property of the interface determines how a font face is displayed based on whether and when it is downloaded and ready to use.
This property is equivalent to the CSS font-display descriptor.

remarks.para:
When this property is used, font loading has a timeline with three periods.
The lengths of the first two periods depend on the value of the property and the user agent.
(See below.)

FontFaceDisplay.value: A string with one of the following values.

FontFaceFamily.summary: The FontFace.family property allows the author to get or set the font family of a object.

remarks.para:
The value is used for name matching against a particular font face when styling elements using the font-family property.
Any name may be used, and this overrides any name specified in the underlying font data.
This property is equivalent to the @font-face/font-family descriptor of @font-face.

FontFaceFeatureSettings.summary: The featureSettings property of the interface retrieves or sets infrequently used font features that are not available from a font's variant properties.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the font-feature-settings descriptor.

FontFaceFontFace.summary: The FontFace() constructor creates a new object.

FontFaceLineGapOverride.summary:
The lineGapOverride property of the interface returns and sets the value of the {{cssxref("@font-face/line-gap-override")}} descriptor.
The possible values are normal, indicating that the metric used should be obtained from the font file, or a percentage.

FontFaceLoad.summary: The load() method of the interface requests and loads a font whose source was specified as a URL. It returns a that resolves with the current FontFace object.

remarks.para: If the source for the font face was specified as binary data, or the font property of the font face is anything other than unloaded, then this method does nothing.

FontFaceLoad.returns: A that resolves with a reference to the current FontFace object when the font loads or rejects with a NetworkError if the loading process fails.

FontFaceLoaded.summary: The loaded read-only property of the interface returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} that resolves with the current FontFace object when the font specified in the object's constructor is done loading or rejects with a SyntaxError.
FontFaceLoaded.value: A that resolves with the current FontFace object.

FontFaceStatus.summary: The status read-only property of the interface returns an enumerated value indicating the status of the font, one of "unloaded", "loading", "loaded", or "error".

FontFaceStretch.summary: The stretch property of the interface retrieves or sets how the font stretches.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the @font-face/font-stretch descriptor.

FontFaceStretch.value: A string containing a descriptor as it would be defined in a style sheet's _font-face rule.

FontFaceStyle.summary: The style property of the interface retrieves or sets the font's style.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the @font-face/font-style descriptor.

FontFaceStyle.value: A string containing the descriptors defined in the style sheet's _font-face rule.

FontFaceUnicodeRange.summary: The unicodeRange property of the interface retrieves or sets the range of unicode code points encompassing the font.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the @font-face/unicode-range descriptor.

FontFaceUnicodeRange.value: A string containing a descriptor as it would appear in a style sheet's _font-face rule.

FontFaceVariant.summary:
CAUTION Non-standard The variant property of the
interface programmatically retrieves or sets font variant
values.
FontFaceVariant.value:
A string containing a descriptor as it would be defined in a style
sheet's _font-face rule.

FontFaceVariationSettings.summary: NOTE Experimental The variationSettings property of the interface retrieves or sets low-level OpenType or TrueType font variations.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the @font-face/font-variation-settings descriptor.

FontFaceWeight.summary: The weight property of the interface retrieves or sets the weight of the font.

remarks.para: This property is equivalent to the @font-face/font-weight descriptor.

FontFaceWeight.value: A string containing a descriptor as it would be defined in a style sheet's _font-face rule.
